name: popp
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Physiological data processing tool of FSL

inputs.description: Input physiological data filename (text format)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Output basename for physiological data and timing/triggers (no extensions)
inputs.name: Output basename

inputs.description: Sampling rate in Hz (default is 100Hz)
inputs.name: Sampling Rate

inputs.description: TR value in seconds
inputs.name: TR Value

inputs.description: Specify column number of respiratory input
inputs.name: Respiratory Column

inputs.description: Specify column number of cardiac input
inputs.name: Cardiac Column

inputs.description: Specify column number of trigger input
inputs.name: Trigger Column

inputs.description: Generate RVT data
inputs.name: RVT Flag

inputs.description: Generate heartrate data
inputs.name: Heartrate Flag

inputs.description: Specify that cardiac data is a trigger
inputs.name: Pulseox Trigger Flag

inputs.description: Specify smoothing amount for cardiac (in seconds)
inputs.name: Cardiac Smoothing Amount

inputs.description: Specify smoothing amount for respiratory (in seconds)
inputs.name: Respiratory Smoothing Amount

inputs.description: High frequency cut off for respiratory filter in Hz (default is 5Hz)
inputs.name: High Frequency Cutoff

inputs.description: Low frequency cut off for respiratory filter in Hz (default is 0.1Hz)
inputs.name: Low Frequency Cutoff

inputs.description: Initial threshold percentile for cardiac (default 90)
inputs.name: Initial Threshold for Cardiac

inputs.description: Neighbourhood exclusion threshold percentile for cardiac (default 60)
inputs.name: Neighbourhood Threshold for Cardiac

inputs.description: Initial threshold percentile for respiratory (default 80)
inputs.name: Initial Threshold for Respiratory

inputs.description: Neighbourhood exclusion threshold percentile for respiratory (default 80)
inputs.name: Neighbourhood Threshold for Respiratory

inputs.description: Invert respiratory trace
inputs.name: Invert Respiratory Flag

inputs.description: Invert cardiac trace
inputs.name: Invert Cardiac Flag

inputs.description: Turn off cleanup phase 1
inputs.name: No Clean Phase 1 Flag

inputs.description: Turn off cleanup phase 2
inputs.name: No Clean Phase 2 Flag

inputs.description: Input cardiac phase for reprocessing (text format)
inputs.name: Load Cardiac Phase

inputs.description: Input respiratory phase for reprocessing (text format)
inputs.name: Load Respiratory Phase

inputs.description: Input volumetric image (EPI) filename
inputs.name: Volumetric Image File

inputs.description: Set sample number of the starting time (t=0)
inputs.name: Starting Sample

inputs.description: Comma separated list of times (in sec) to add to respiratory peak list (uses nearest local max)
inputs.name: Add Respiratory Peaks

inputs.description: Comma separated list of times (in sec) to delete from respiratory peak list (uses nearest existing peak)
inputs.name: Delete Respiratory Peaks

inputs.description: Comma separated list of times (in sec) to add to cardiac peak list (uses nearest local max)
inputs.name: Add Cardiac Peaks

inputs.description: Comma separated list of times (in sec) to delete from cardiac peak list (uses nearest existing peak)
inputs.name: Delete Cardiac Peaks

inputs.description: Switch on diagnostic messages
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Output debugging information
inputs.name: Debug Flag

inputs.description: Display this help message
inputs.name: Help Flag
